snippet: The Carnegie Hall concert honoring David Bowie on March 31 will be joined by a second tribute show, at Radio City Music Hall on April 1.
abstract: Carnegie Hall's planned concert in March honoring singer David Bowie will be reframed as memorial concert following Bowie's death; second show will be added at Radio City Museum Hall featuring additional performers.
lead_paragraph: The Carnegie Hall concert honoring David Bowie on March 31 will be joined by a second tribute show, at Radio City Music Hall on April 1.

headline.main: Bowie Tribute Concert to Have a Second Night, at Radio City
